title.full: METAL GEAR SOLID V THE PHANTOM PAIN
title.reduced: METAL GEAR SOLID V THE PHANTOM PAIN

description.full: [Important Notification]  The online services of the Xbox 360 version of METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN and METAL GEAR ONLINE will be terminated by May 31, 2022 at 06:00 UTC.  The main game can still be played offline after the online service ends.  The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese. Ushering in a new era for the METAL GEAR franchise with cutting-edge technology powered by the Fox Engine, METAL GEAR SOLID V: The Phantom Pain, will provide players a first-rate gaming experience as they are offered tactical freedom to carry out open-world missions.
description.short: Ushering in a new era for the METAL GEAR franchise with cutting-edge technology powered by the Fox Engine, METAL GEAR SOLID V: The Phantom Pain, will provide players a first-rate gaming experience as they are offered tactical freedom to carry out open-world missions.
